title: Resplendent Dessert
summaries: The Resplendent Dessert is a pet-summoning item. It is the combination of the Royal Delight from King Slime and the Regal Delicacy from Queen Slime, allowing the player to summon both Slime Prince and Slime Princess at the same time.
